As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may reveal a wild creature card from your hand or choose a wild creature you control. [i](Bears, Birds, Cats, Rats, and Spiders are wild creatures.)[/i]
Mother’s Fury deals 3 damage to target attacking creature. If you revealed a wild creature card from your hand or chose a wild creature as you cast this spell, Mother’s Fury deals damage equal to the power of that card or creature instead.
